verses.verse: O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> to whom <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> belongeth; O <S%H410>God,<s%> to whom <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> belongeth, show <S%H3313>thyself.<s%>
Lift up <S%H5375>thyself,<s%> thou <S%H8199>judge<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H7725>render<s%> a <S%H1576>reward<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H1343>proud.<s%>
LORD, <S%H3068><s%> how <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> shall the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> how <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> shall the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5937>triumph?<s%>
How long shall they <S%H5042>utter<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> hard <S%H6277>things?<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> boast <S%H559>themselves?<s%>
They break in <S%H1792>pieces<s%> thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6031>afflict<s%> thine <S%H5159>heritage.<s%>
They <S%H2026>slay<s%> the <S%H490>widow<s%> and the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> and <S%H7523>murder<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless.<s%>
Yet they <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H3050>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H995>regard<s%> it.
Understand, <S%H995><s%> ye <S%H1197>brutish<s%> among the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and ye <S%H3684>fools,<s%> <S%H4970>when<s%> will ye be <S%H7919>wise?<s%>
He that <S%H5193>planted<s%> the <S%H241>ear,<s%> shall he <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hear?<s%> he that <S%H3335>formed<s%> the <S%H5869>eye,<s%> shall he <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5027>see?<s%>
He that <S%H3256>chastiseth<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> he <S%H3198>correct?<s%> he that <S%H3925>teacheth<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> shall not he know?
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>
Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> thou <S%H3256>chastenest,<s%> O <S%H3050>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3925>teachest<s%> him out of thy <S%H4480>law;<s%> <S%H8451><s%>

That thou mayest give him <S%H8252>rest<s%> from the <S%H4480>days<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of <S%H7451>adversity,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H7845>pit<s%> be <S%H3738>digged<s%> for the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> cast <S%H5203>off<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will he <S%H5800>forsake<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H310>follow<s%> it.

Who <S%H4310><s%> will rise <S%H6965>up<s%> for me <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H7489>evildoers?<s%> or <S%H4310>who<s%> will stand <S%H3320>up<s%> for me <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity?<s%>
Unless <S%H3884><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had been my <S%H5833>help,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> had <S%H4592>almost<s%> <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> in <S%H1745>silence.<s%>
When <S%H518><s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H4131>slippeth;<s%> thy <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> held me <S%H5582>up.<s%>
In the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of my <S%H8312>thoughts<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me thy <S%H8575>comforts<s%> <S%H8173>delight<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
Shall the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1942>iniquity<s%> have <S%H2266>fellowship<s%> with thee, which <S%H3335>frameth<s%> <S%H5999>mischief<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> a <S%H2706>law?<s%>
They gather themselves <S%H1413>together<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and <S%H7561>condemn<s%> the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>
But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> my <S%H4869>defense;<s%> and my <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H4268>refuge.<s%>

And he shall <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> their own <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> and shall cut them <S%H6789>off<s%> in their own <S%H7451>wickedness;<s%> yea, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> shall cut them <S%H6789>off.<s%>
